meanings.definition: A publication that combines elements of a magazine and a catalog, typically used for advertising products or services.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy looking at magalogs to see the new products available.
meanings.sent2: The company sent out magalogs to showcase their latest offerings.
meanings.sent3: The magalogs were so colorful and informative, they made me want to buy everything!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a treasure trove of ideas, like a stack of magalogs waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The vivid images in the magalogs stayed in my mind long after I put them down.

meanings.definition: To create or distribute a magalog.
meanings.sent1: She magalogs every month to promote the new products.
meanings.sent2: They magalogs to reach a wider audience.
meanings.sent3: He magalogs with such enthusiasm that it's contagious!
meanings.sent4: The way she magalogs ideas is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: Magalogging effectively requires creativity and strategic thinking.
